title: Update generated logo asset and switch header/footer references

requirements.summary: Add the redesigned logo image asset and ensure the header and footer render the updated logo at the existing sizes without distortion.
acceptanceCriteria: A new logo image exists under frontend/public/assets/generated and differs from the previous design.
Site header logo image renders the updated logo at the existing size (h-10 w-10) without distortion.
Site footer logo image renders the updated logo at the existing size (h-8 w-8) without distortion.
No other site functionality or routes are affected.

file_operations.description: Add the newly generated logo image asset (fresh, warm, friendly redesign) as a static file served from public assets.
Update the header logo to use the new generated asset path while preserving the existing sizing classes (h-10 w-10) and object-contain so the logo is not distorted.
Update the footer logo to use the new generated asset path while preserving the existing sizing classes (h-8 w-8) and object-contain so the logo is not distorted.

requirements.summary: Replace all frontend references to the old generated logo filename with the new logo filename while keeping existing alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: All instances of the old logo path are updated (including SiteHeader and SiteFooter).
The application builds and runs with no missing-asset errors (no broken image icons for the logo).

file_operations.description: Replace any remaining references to "/assets/generated/cafe-logo.dim_512x512.png" with "/assets/generated/cafe-logo-v2.dim_512x512.png" in the header, keeping the existing alt text unchanged.
Replace any remaining references to "/assets/generated/cafe-logo.dim_512x512.png" with "/assets/generated/cafe-logo-v2.dim_512x512.png" in the footer, keeping the existing alt text unchanged.
